ack.p: We would like to appreciate GC Sar for veterinary, Sandeep Sinha for in vivo biology, Siva Kumar Solleti for in vitro biology, and Vallabh Muley for chemistry supports and Pushpendra Singh, Vipin Kumar, and Sonit Kumar for their excellent animal handling and maintenance. We would also extend our gratitude to Priyanka Kandpal, Brij Kishore, Tarun Rajput, Gagan Kumar, and Lalit Mohan for their swift administrative supports.
